name: ANTSTRONAUTS (Keith & Snake Games, Keith Burgun Games, HappySnakeGames)
name_original: ANTSTRONAUTS (Keith & Snake Games, Keith Burgun Games, HappySnakeGames)
description:
ANTSTRONAUTS  -  beta 0.11f

Antstronauts is a small strategy game where you venture into space to make some new ant colonies. Don't forget to protect your queen and build upgrades to survive the hazards that lie ahead.

1st June Update - version 0.11

  • fixed bugs that have caused various crashes
